TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ButtonBase : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl, System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
.class public auto ansi abstract ButtonBase extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public MustInherit Class ButtonBase Inherits ContentControl Implements ICommandSource
public ref class ButtonBase abstract : System::Windows::Controls::ContentControl, System::Windows::Input::ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示所有 控件的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for all controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件，当用户单击时进行响应。Handle the event to respond when the user clicks a . 用户可以引发事件通过使用或时，按 ENTER 或空格键在控件有焦点。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 当用户按空格键后，控制集到`true`和捕获鼠标。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发的鼠标事件，例如和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用或 enter 键不会更改或捕获鼠标，但它确实增加事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 设置附加到属性`true`。The sets the attached property to `true`. 设置属性`false`。The sets the property to `false`. A是，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以引发事件通过使用或时，按 ENTER 或空格键在控件有焦点。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 当用户按空格键后，控制集到`true`和捕获鼠标。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发的鼠标事件，例如和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用或 enter 键不会更改或捕获鼠标，但它确实增加事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 标记为在已处理的事件方法并引发事件。The marks the event as handled in the method and raises the event. 因此，事件将永远不会发生的控件，继承自。Hence, the event will never occur for a control that inherits from . 相反，将附加到事件处理程序事件，或者调用与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。Instead, attach an event handler to the event, or call with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示三个不同的方式响应的单击的三个按钮。The following example shows three buttons that respond to clicks in three different ways. - 悬停时的用户将鼠标悬停在按钮上时的第一个按钮更改颜色Hover - the first button changes colors when the user hovers with the mouse over the button - 按下的第二个按钮要求鼠标指针位于该按钮时按下鼠标。Press - the second button requires that the mouse be pressed while the mouse pointer is in the button. - 释放-第三个不重置按钮的背景色，直到按下鼠标并将其释放的按钮中。Release - the third does not reset the background color of the buttons until the mouse is pressed and released in the button. [!code-xaml[ClickModes_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ Command { System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在按下按钮时调用的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command to invoke when this button is pressed.

value.span: 当按此按钮时要调用的命令。

span.span: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于将命令与特定按钮实例相关联。This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，此属性通常设置为静态命令值从一个现有的命令库，如或。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)或。For details, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md) or . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CommandParameter { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要传递给 属性的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the property.

value.span: 要传递给 属性的参数。

span.span: Parameter to pass to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数命令库中的现有命令不使用命令参数。Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter. 命令参数中使用的命令，其中的大部分携带某些基元类型值，如整数或字符串中添加参数。Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string. 但是，它是可以创建自定义命令，该命令需要为其命令参数的非基元类型。However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter. 有关自定义命令这种情况下，设置在代码中可能需要一个新的或现有的对象实例。For a custom command case like this, setting in code might require a new or existing object instance. 设置标记中，则可能需要的属性元素语法，其中填充属性元素语法对象元素都需要该命令的类型的新元素。Setting in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command. 此外，在标记中的设置可能需要通过标记扩展对现有对象的引用 (使用进行这些引用通常[绑定标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md)或[否则标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)).Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension.md) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension.md)). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个按钮，该值指示鼠标左键的状态，或到按钮上方按空格键。 is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button. 当是`true`，该控件会捕获鼠标。When is `true`, the control captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发的鼠标事件，例如和。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用或 enter 键不会更改或捕获鼠标，但的确能引发事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but is does raise the event. 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，具有的受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用触发器样式的属性。This example shows how to use the property in a trigger style. span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`时未设置为和以下情况之一为真：This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when is not set to and one of the following cases are true: - 用户按空格键。The user presses the SPACEBAR. - 在用户按 ENTER 和是`true`对于此控件。The user presses ENTER and is `true` for this control. 在所有其他情况下，此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

summary.span: 为当鼠标指针悬停于此元素上并移动鼠标指针时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the mouse pointer moves while over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`时未设置为和是`true`。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when is not set to and is `true`. 若要响应事件，将附加到事件处理程序事件，或者调用与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。To respond to the event, attach an event handler to the event, or call with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
